description: Use `AWS::XRay::ResourcePolicy` to specify an X-Ray resource-based policy, which grants one or more AWS services and accounts permissions to access X-Ray . Each resource-based policy is associated with a specific AWS account.

BypassPolicyLockoutCheck.description: A flag to indicate whether to bypass the resource-based policy lockout safety check.

PolicyDocument.description: The resource-based policy document, which can be up to 5kb in size.

PolicyName.description: The name of the resource-based policy. Must be unique within a specific AWS account.
